alert.note: Alert for Eastern Preston; Monongalia; Preston; Ridges of Eastern Monongalia and Northwestern Preston (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 2:30PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...THUNDERSTORMS WITH GUSTY WIND WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN GREENE... SOUTHEASTERN FAYETTE...NORTHEASTERN MONONGALIA AND NORTHERN PRESTON COUNTIES THROUGH 300 PM EDT... At 229 PM EDT, radar indicated thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles northeast of Farmington to near Point Marion. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up OF 40 TO 45 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Morgantown, Westover, Kingwood, Star City, Farmington, Point Marion, Granville, Brookhaven, Cassville, Masontown, Albright, and Markleysburg. This includes the following highways... Interstate 68 in West Virginia between mile markers 4 and 31. Interstate 79 in West Virginia between mile markers 154 and 157. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Preston; Monongalia; Preston; Ridges of Eastern Monongalia and Northwestern Preston
